summary: An ordinance providing for the opening, widening and altering of Union Street, in the City of Seattle, from 3rd Avenue as the westerly limit of such opening, widening and altering to 9th Avenue and Hubbell Place, as the easterly limit of such opening, widening and altering; and providing for the taking and damaging of land therefor and for the ascertainment of payment to be taken and damaged for said purpose, and an assessment upon the property specially benefited for the purpose of making such compensation.
